title.native: 完璧すぎて可愛げがないと婚約破棄された聖女は隣国に売られる
title.romaji: Kanpeki Sugite Kawai-ge ga Nai to Konyaku Haki Sareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru
title.english: The Too-Perfect Saint: Tossed Aside by My Fiancé and Sold to Another Kingdom

description:
Philia’s family has produced saints for generations. It’s no surprise that she’s known as the greatest saint of all time—and set to marry the second prince, Julius. What no one expects is for Julius to call off the engagement, claiming that Philia’s perfection makes her charmless and unlikable. To add insult to injury, Philia is packed off to a neighboring country in exchange for gold and resources, forcing her to leave her homeland! Despite bracing herself for mistreatment, Philia finds a warm welcome in her new town, where she puts her saintly abilities to good use erecting barriers against monsters and curing epidemics. But even as she flourishes in her new life, her homeland is under threat of destruction!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

Note: Each episode streamed 1 week early on ABEMA. The original TV broadcast started on April 3rd 2025.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

node.description: He is a member of Writers Guild of Japan.

__Residency:__ Shibuya, Tokyo, Japan

__[Artist Profile (MFM)](https://www.musicformusic.jp/creators/naokiitai/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/NaokI_Edge)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/naoki.itai)__

__Introduction:__
Naoki Itai is a Japanese composer, arranger and sound producer who works for company [MUSIC FOR MUSIC Inc.](http://www.musicformusic.jp/)

__Biography:__
He started playing the guitar at the age of 14, and started working as a professional guitarist at the age of 19. As of recent he is involved in producing music for various artists as a sound producer for company Music for Music, which operates the music studio "FORSTA".

**[YouTube](https://youtube.com/channel/UCGLuo2pPMugO2b8CPYCwTHQ) | [Twitter](https://x.com/WON_OW) | [Instagram](https://instagram.com/won__ow) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@won_ow) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/1w5kguKKWpMp9eoEVUQrbf)**

__WON__ is a Japanese singer and lyricist signed to VIA, a TOY'S FACTORY label, and TALTO.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/濱野高年)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule.
